Posts.Content: It sounds like you've reached your limit; I probably would have too. ~Hugs
Posts.Title: Too Much

Posts.Content: On Jan 12, 2011 11:38 PM wstiewig wrote: Hey, my first time here.  one week into a 35 week radiation regimen, and 3 cisplatin blasts in the meantime. the first one kicked my butt!  I really thought I could do without the peg tube, going to have that put in tomorrow.  too skinny to keep losing like this.  the mucus is atrocious, and the anxiety is eating me alive.  can't sleep for any length of time.  I know all the advice about positive thinking, etc....but when they give u a 50/50 prognosis, and you're only 52, and just starting to enjoy life with your 3 year old grandson, this is a real kicker in the self doubt arena. Hi; make a post over in head & neck; you will get lots of help. I don't understand the prognosis; if you make a post in head & neck; post where your cancer is located. http://www.cancercompass.com/message-board/cancers/head-and-
Posts.Title: tonsil cancer, radiation, chemo, esophageal surgery
